Name: Damage Up
Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Slash DMG Up
Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Slash skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Pierce DMG Up
Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Pierce skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Blunt DMG Up
Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Blunt skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Wrath skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Gloom skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Envy DMG Up
Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% more damage with Envy skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Description: Envy skills gain (Stack) final power for one turn.

Description: Take (Stack x 10)% less damage from skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Description: Deal (Stack x 10)% less damage with Slash skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Attack Power Down
Description: Attack skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Defense Power Down
Description: Defense skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Slash Power Down
Description: Slash skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Pierce Power Down
Description: Pierce skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Blunt Power Down
Description: Blunt skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Wrath Power Down
Description: Wrath skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Lust Power Down
Description: Lust skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Sloth Power Down
Description: Sloth skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Gluttony Power Down
Description: Gluttony skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Gloom Power Down
Description: Gloom skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Pride Power Down
Description: Pride skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Envy Power Down
Description: Envy skills lose (Stack) final power for one turn.

Name: Fragile
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Slash Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Slash skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Pierce Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Pierce skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Blunt Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Blunt skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Wrath Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Wrath skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Lust Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Lust skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Sloth Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Sloth skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Gluttony Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Gluttony skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Gloom Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Gloom skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Pride Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Pride skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Envy Fragility
Description: Take (Stack x 10)% more damage from Envy skills for one turn. (Max 100% at 10 Count)

Name: Slash Resist Down
Description: Decrease Slash Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Pierce Resist Down
Description: Decrease Pierce Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Blunt Resist Down
Description: Decrease Blunt Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Wrath Resist Down
Description: Decrease Wrath Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Lust Resist Down
Description: Decrease Lust Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Sloth Resist Down
Description: Decrease Sloth Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Gluttony Resist Down
Description: Decrease Gluttony Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Gloom Resist Down
Description: Decrease Gloom Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Pride Resist Down
Description: Decrease Pride Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Envy Resist Down
Description: Decrease Envy Resistance based on Stack (0.1 per Stack)

Name: Offense Level Up
Description: Offense Level increases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Offense Level Down
Description: Offense Level decreases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Defense Level Up
Description: Defense Level increases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Defense Level Down
Description: Defense Level decreases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Plus Coin Boost
Description: Raise the Power of Plus Coins by (Stack)

Name: Plus Coin Drop
Description: Reduce the Power of Plus Coins by (Stack)

Name: Minus Coin Boost
Description: Raise the Power of Minus Coins by (Stack)

Name: Minus Coin Drop
Description: Reduce the Power of Minus Coins by (Stack)

Name: SP Loss Efficiency
Description: Gain/Lose (Stack) additional SP when losing SP.

Name: SP Gain Efficiency
Description: Gain/Lose (Stack) additional SP when gaining SP.

Name: HP Healing Up
Description: Increases HP Healing provided by Passive abilities, Skill or Coin effects. (Max 5)

Name: HP Healing Down
Description: Decreases HP Healing provided by Passive abilities, Skill or Coin effects. (Max 5)

Name: Rupture Protection
Description: Take (Stack) less damage from Rupture effects for one turn.

Name: Rupture Fragility
Description: Take (Stack) more damage from Rupture effects for one turn.

Name: Sinking Protection
Description: Take (Stack) less damage from Sinking effects for one turn.

Name: Sinking Fragility
Description: Take (Stack) more damage from Sinking effects for one turn.

Name: Haste
Description: Speed increases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Bind
Description: Speed decreases by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Charge
Description: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Max 20. Turn End: Count decreases by 1.

Name: Charge Barrier
Description:
Gain (Charge Barrier x 3) Shield.
Lose 1 Charge Barrier after losing (Charge Barrier x 3) Shield.
If the unit is a W Corp employee, ALL Charge Barrier effects activate at (Charge Barrier x 5) instead of (Charge Barrier x 3)
Turn End: Gain Charge Count for every Charge Barrier count. Charge Barrier and Shield gained from Charge barrier expire completely next turn.

Name: Spark Discharge
Description: When hit, the attacker gains +1 Charge Count, and when hit by a Gloom attack, gain +1 Rupture Count. Reduce Count by 1 afterwards.

Name: Poise
Description: On hit, gain (Potency x 5)% Crit Chance. Reduce Count by 1 on Critical Hit. Reduce Count by 1 at Turn End.

Name: Appetite
Description: Increases the healing provided by the Passive [Rustle Up]. Spent when the Passive activates.

Name: E.G.O. Resource Amp
Description: Increases the amount of E.G.O. Resources gained from skills by (Stack) for one turn.

Name: Fanatic
Description: Raise Skill Final Power by (Stack) against units with Nails for one turn.

Name: Unjust Enrichment
Description:
Gained on Heads Hit against target with Bleed (Max 4)
When 'Bullets are Pricey' Passive activates, consume all Unjust Enrichment stack to deal bonus damage.

Name: Paralyze
Description: Fix the Power of (Stack) Coins to 0 for one turn.

Name: Burn
Description: At the end of the turn, take (Potency) fixed damage, then reduce Count by 1.

Name: Bleed
Description: When tossing an Attack Skill Coin, take (Potency) fixed damage, then reduce Count by 1.

Name: Rupture
Description: When hit by an Attack, take (Potency) fixed damage, then reduce Count by 1.

Name: Sinking
Description: When hit by an Attack, take (Potency) SP damage (Applies as Gloom-affinity damage to Abnormalities), then reduce Count by 1.

Name: Sinking Deluge
Description: Deal SP Damage by (Sinking Count x Sinking Potency), then remove all Sinking. If target's SP is -45 or lower, excess SP damage is dealt as Gloom-affinity HP damage. (Units with no SP take the entirety as Gloom-affinity HP damage).

Name: Tremor
Description: When attacked by Skills that Trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by (Potency). At the end of the turn, reduce Count by 1.

Name: Tremor Burst
Description: Raise target's Stagger Threshold by (Tremor Potency) on target.

Name: Weakness Analyzed
Description: A random 'Endured' or 'Normal' Attack type resistance is reduced by 0.2 for one turn.

Name: Declared Duel
Description: Declarer has +1 Clash Power and gains 1 Haste next turn after a successful attack (Max 4 times per turn) against inflicted unit. Expires when declarer inflicts this status on another target. Replaced when another unit declares a duel.

Name: Nails
Description:
Unique Bleed.
Turn Start: Gain 1 Bleed and increase Bleed Count by (Stack). Turn End: Halve the Count (Rounded down).

Name: Gaze
Description: Take +20% damage from Pierce and Blunt skills for one turn. The ally that defeats the marked unit heals 10 SP. If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic next turn.

Name: Talisman
Description:
Max Stack: 6
On Hit, consume 1 Rupture Count on target to inflict (Stack / 2) Rupture (inflicts at least 1 Rupture if Count was consumed; rounded down)
When hit, gain (Stack / 2) Rupture and lose 1 Stack (Gain at least 1; rounded down)
Turn End: At 6+ Stack, remove all Talisman on self and take fixed damage by Stack

Name: Talisman (Old)
Description: On hit, inflict (Stack) Rupture. When hit, gain (Stack) Rupture. Turn End: At 6+ Count, remove all Talisman and take (Stack) fixed damage.

Name: Vengeance Mark
Description: Applied to the unit that dealt the most damage to an ally. (Max 1)

Name: Dark Flame
Description:
Unique Burn.
Max value: 7
Target loses Defense Level equal to (Stack).
Turn End: Deal (Stack x Burn) Pride Affinity damage, then expires.

Name: Maggots
Description: Turn End: Take (Stack) Gluttony Affinity damage; reduce Stack by 1. Bleed Count +1.

Name: Curse
Description:
Turn End: Gain one of the following, then reduce Count by 1:
1 Attack Power Down, 1 Defense Power Down, 2 Offense Level Down, 2 Defense Level Down

Name: Pink Ribbons
Description: Count increases by 1 whenever the affected unit tosses an Attack Skill Coin. At the end of the turn, inflict (Stack) Bind, then remove the effect.

Name: Dimensional Rift
Description: At the end of the turn, gain (Stack) Rupture Count. Then, remove the effect.

Name: Aggro
Description: In Focused Encounters, slots with higher Aggro are more likely to be targeted by enemies.

Name: Ammo
Description: Spent by certain skills. Some attacks cancel if lacking Ammo.

Name: Discard
Description:
Delete Skills that fit the condition and are selectable during the Chaining Phase from the Dashboard.
Defensive & E.G.O Skills do not count. Does not delete the Skill from the upcoming Skills List.
Discarded Skills will not activate Skill or Coin effects other than effects from Discard, and will not give E.G.O resources.

Name: Insight
Description: The rank of the last Skill Discarded by the unit with this effect. (Base Value: 1)

Name: K Corp Ampule
Description: Turn Start: At less than 4 Count, heal by (Stack x 5)% of Max HP. At 4+ Count, the unit dies.

Name: Magic Bullet
Description:
Max: 7
Lobotomy E.G.O::Magic Bullet Outis Skill 3 Only:
0-3: +0 Coin +0 Base
4-6: +2 Coin +2 Base
7: +6 Coin +15 Base

Name: Surgery
Description:
Reduce Max HP by (Stack x 20)%.
Deal (Stack x 20)% more damage.
Gain (Stack) Haste at Turn Start.
Die when Stack reaches 5.

Name: Assist Attack
Description:
If Unit A applies this effect to Unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with its Skill 1 against the same enemy Unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at Unit A's Attack End.
The Skill used as an Assist Attack does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skills list.

Name: Heated Gas Harpoon
Description: For 1 turn, inflict 1 Burn on Heads Hit.

Name: Overheated Gas Harpoon
Description: For 1 turn, inflict 1 Burn on hit.

Name: Red Plum Blossom
Description:
Unique Bleed.
Max Value: 10
+10% chance for this unit to be Critically Hit if this unit is the main target.
When struck by a Critical Hit, gain Bleed based on half the value and take +(Stack)x3% damage from Critical Hits.
Reduce Count by 1 when hit.

Name: Swordplay of the Homeland
Description:
If unit has 5+ Poise upon Skill use, Skill 1 and 2 gain Coin Power +(3/# of Coins)(Min 1) and +(30/# of Coins)% damage on Critical Hit
If unit has 7+ Poise upon Skill use, Skill 3 deals +(30/# of Coins)% more damage and +(50/# of Coins)% more damage on Critical Hit

Name: Sword of the Homeland - Rending
Description: Skill 1 gains Final Power by the effect's Count for this turn.

Name: Sword of the Homeland - Penetrating
Description: Skill 2 gains Final Power by the effect's Count for this turn.

Name: Amplitude Conversion
Description:
Converts Tremor or already converted Tremor on target to a different type of Tremor.
Potency and Count values do not change over the conversion.

Name: Tremor - Decay
Description:
Lose 1 Defense Level for every 4 Tremor on self.
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Echoes of the Manor
Description:
- 50% chance to gain +1 Sinking Count when gaining Sinking or Sinking Count from Skill or Coin effects
- Units with SP Change Panic Type to Echoes of the Manor. When this unit Panics, inflict Echoes of the Manor to 2 random other allies of this unit
- Units without SP: -10`% chance to flip Heads
- Reduce by 1 at Turn End
- This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value
- Apply the 'Units without SP' conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types

Name: Overwhelmed (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Down

Name: Overwhelmed (Panic)
Description: Does not act for this turn

Name: Atrophied (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Down

Name: Atrophied (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 4 Attack Power Down

Name: Agitated (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Damage Up and 2 Fragile

Name: Agitated (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Damage Up and 5 Fragile

Name: Maddened (Low Morale)
Description: When at Low Morale for the first time, targets indiscriminately

Name: Maddened (Panic)
Description: Targets indiscriminately, Clash Power +1, and again 2 Damage Up

Name: Unstable (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 3 Bind

Name: Unstable (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Become staggered

Name: Dejection (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 1 Fragile; in a clash, if any Coins land tails, Clash Power -1 for the clash

Name: Dejection (Panic)
Description: Gain 3 Fragile; in a clash, if any Coins land tails, Clash Power -3 for the clash

Name: Impurity (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 1 Fragile; target loses 2 SP if this unit loses the clash

Name: Impurity (Panic)
Description: Gain 1 Fragile; target loses 5 SP if this unit loses the clash

Name: Vengeance (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 3 Defense Level Down. Gain Damage Up based on the amount of damage taken last turn (1 Damage Up for every 3% Max HP lost)

Name: Vengeance (Panic)
Description: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 6 Defense Level Down. Gain Damage Up based on the amount of damage taken last turn (1 Damage Up for every 3% Max HP lost)

Name: Splitting (Low Morale)
Description: Lose 2 HP on self with every Clash. Gain 1 Offense Level Up at Turn Start

Name: Splitting (Panic)
Description: Lose 3 HP on self with every Clash. Gain 2 Offense Level Up at Turn Start

Name: Echoes of the Manor (Low Morale)
Description: Clash Power -1 on self. Deal +10% damage on Heads Hit

Name: Echoes of the Manor (Panic)
Description: Clash Power -2 on self. Gain 1 Damage Up

Name: Organization Compulsion (Low Morale)
Description: Lose 5 SP on Clash Lose. Gain 1 Haste next turn when hit (Max 2)

Name: Organization Compulsion (Panic)
Description: Gain 2 Fragile. Gain 2 Haste next turn when hit (Max 3)

Name: Resentment (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Damage Up and 3 Defense Level Down

Name: Resentment (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 5 Defense Level Down

Name: Misshapen Painting (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Fragile

Name: Misshapen Painting (Panic)
Description: Gain 1 Plus Coin Boost and 3 Fragile

Name: Hatred (Low Morale)
Description:
Clash Win: Gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn (3 times per turn)
Clash Lose: Gain 1 Defense Level Up (3 times per turn)

Name: Hatred (Panic)
Description:
Clash Win: Gain 1 Offense Level Up this turn and next turn (3 times per turn)
Clash Lose: Gain 1 Defense Level Up (3 times per turn)
Turn End: Gain 2 Haste next turn

Name: Revenge (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 3 Defense Level Down and 3 Damage Up

Name: Revenge (Panic)
Description: Gain 6 Defense Level Down and 6 Damage Up

Name: Tremor - Fracture
Description:
When Staggered, and when the sum of Tremor and Tremor Count adds up to 20 or higher, raise Stagger Level by 1
Cannot exceed maximum Stagger Level with this effect
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Before the King in Binds
Description: When this unit's Attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 100% of the damage dealt as (Affinity of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 enemies with the least HP that can be attacked

Name: Before the King
Description: When this unit's Attack with 1 Atk Weight hits, inflict 50% of the damage dealt as (Affinity of the Attack Skill used to hit) damage against 2 enemies with the least HP that can be attacked

Name: B.M.
Description:
Enhances Edgar Family Chief Butler Ryōshū's Skills against targets with this effect.
Turn End: Reduce the Count by 1.

Name: Volatile Passion
Description:
On Hit, inflict 1 Burn
If the main target has Burn, +1 Final Power
When hit, if this unit had a Defense Skill chained at Combat Start, inflict Burn against the attacker for the turn
Turn End: Lose (# of turns spent in Volatile E.G.O state x 5) SP. (Max SP loss: 40)

Name: Blubberbubble
Description:
This effect counts as a 'Shield Management' effect.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.
This unit does not lose Shield at Turn End as long as it has the Blubberbubble effect (Unless depleted by damage or effect).
If the Shield affected by Blubberbubble breaks due to taking damage, inflict 4 Sinking Potency/Count against the attacker (randomly split between Potency and Count).
This unit can stack its Shield value by using this effect. However, as long as Blubberbubble is in effect, the max Shield cannot exceed 60% of this unit's Max HP.

Name: Tremor - Reverb
Description:
On Tremor Burst, take Sloth damage equal to Tremor on self
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Amplitude Entanglement
Description:
- Combine the Entangling Tremor effect and the target's Tremor type under Tremor - Superposition
- Potency and Count values do not change over Entanglement
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion for Tremor - Superposition, activates as Amplitude Entanglement instead
- Turn End: Converted into Tremor

Name: Tremor - Everlasting
Description:
When hit by Skills or Coin effects that Trigger Tremor Burst, (Tremor on self)% chance to trigger an additional Tremor Burst (Max 50%)
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Borrowed Time
Description:
Turn End at 2+ Count:
- Gain (Stack - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn
- If this unit is set to gain more Bind than Haste next turn, the Borrowed Time effect expires at the next Turn Start, and this unit gets Staggered
Turn End: At 1 Count, gain 2 x (Stack - 1) Bind
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack, lose 1 Count

Name: Time Moratorium
Description:
Does not take any damage as long as this effect is active, store all damage received instead
Combat End: If there is only 1 Count left of this effect, the effect triggers Tremor Burst after dealing (100 + (Stack x 15)))% of stored damage as Sloth damage
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
If another instance of Time Moratorium is inflicted on a unit with Time Moratorium, this effect will immediately expire after triggering the Tremor Burst and Sloth Damage effects

Name: Tremor - Chain
Description:
Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor on self (Max 3)
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Broken Unity (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 1 Fragile. Gain +1 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

Name: Broken Unity (Panic)
Description: Gain 2 Fragile. Gain +2 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

Name: Erudition
Description:
Max Value: 6
- When Discarding a Skill, gain (Erudition x 1.5)% of this unit's Max HP as Shield
- If this unit Discards a Skill at 2+ Insight, gain 1 Clash Power (Once per turn)
- Reduced by 1 when taking HP damage after getting hit by an enemy's Attack Skill
- Expires when Staggered

Name: Gaze of Contempt
Description:
Max Value: 7
- Deal +7% damage for every Gaze of Contempt on self
- Turn End: This effect expires
- Turn End: At 7 Gaze of Contempt, convert to Contempt of the Gaze next turn instead of expiring

Name: Contempt of the Gaze
Description:
- Gain 7 Protection
- Gain 7 Damage Down
- One of this unit's Skill Slots gains +20 Aggro
- Cannot gain Gaze of Contempt as long as Contempt of the Gaze is active
- Turn End: This effect expires

Name: Load
Description:
Max Value: 6
Attack Skills that consumed Charge Count deal +2.5% damage for every value on self (Max 15%)
If the affected ally is a W Corp. employee, deal +5% damage for every value instead (Max 30%)
Turn End: This effect expires

Name: Torn Memory
Description:
Max Value: 7
Used for certain Skills

Name: Photoelectricity
Description:
Max Value: 3
When this unit is hit, the Attacker gains Charge Count equal to the value (Once per Skill)
If the Attacker has 5- Charge Count, gain +3 additional Charge Count
Turn End: This effect expires

Name: Coffin
Description:
Max Value: 10
At Turn End:
- Gain 2 Damage Up next turn for every 3 Value (Max 6)
- Raise minimum Speed by 1 for every 4 value next turn (Max 2)
- Gain 1 Clash Power Up for every 5 value next turn (Max 2)

Name: Wild Hunt
Description:
In the same turn this unit gained Wild Hunt for the first time, always have 1 remaining HP; 'revive' (heal by 50% HP and reset SP to 0) at Turn End.
If this unit is killed by an attack, gain E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource
If this unit is killed by an attack, inflict 3 Sinking against the last attacker
Dies at the end of the same turn this unit is revived

Name: Dullahan
Description:
Max Value: 3
Lose 3 Defense Level
Gain 3 Offense Level
Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
Turn End: Gain 1 Dullahan next turn (At -25 SP or less, however, completely lose Dullahan)
Turn End: Lose (15 - (Coffin / 2)) SP (Min 10)

Name: Impending Ruin
Description:
For targets with SP: Change their Panic Type to 'Ruin'
Units without SP: -10% chance to flip Heads
Reduced by 1 at Turn End
This effect is not cumulative; inflicting it will replace the current value with the inflicted value
Apply the 'Units without SP' conditional to certain enemies that have SP but can't change their Panic Types

Name: Bloodthirst (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile and Damage Up

Name: Bloodthirst (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Fragile and Damage Up

Name: Ruin (Low Morale)
Description: Gain 3 Sinking at every Turn End and 1 lose Clash Power

Name: Ruin (Panic)
Description: Gain 5 Sinking and 3 Sinking Count at every Turn End and lose 2 Clash Power

Name: Red Eyes
Description:
Base Skill Coin effects inflict +1 Bleed
Unique Charge (fixed Potency; Max 20 Value)
Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
- Stage 1 (1 ~ 7): Red Eyes
- Stage 2 (8 ~ 15): Red Eyes - Alert
- Stage 3 (16 ~ 20): Red Eyes - Devouring
The amount of additional Bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement stage

Name: Penitence
Description:
Heal 2 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
Unique Charge (fixed Potency; Max 20 Value)
Turn Start: Gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
- Stage 1 (1 ~ 7): Penitence
- Stage 2 (8 ~ 15): Penitence - Periphery
- Stage 3 (16 ~ 20): Penitence - Confession
The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is equal to (buff enhancement stage x 2)

Name: Only Ashes Remain
Description:
Cannot hold Red Eyes & Penitence
When gaining Red Eyes with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by (Red Eyes gained)% of this unit's Max HP (Max 2 times per turn)
When gaining Penitence with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by (Penitence gained / 2) SP (2 times per turn)
Turn End: This effect expires

Name: The Living & The Departed
Description:
Unique Ammo
The sum of Potency and Count maxes out at 20
Whether The Living (Potency) or The Departed (Count) will be consumed is randomly selected

Name: Butterfly
Description:
Unique Sinking
Base Value: 0; Max Value: 15
The Potency and Count of this effect are called 'The Living' and 'The Departed' respectively
When hit, the attacker heals (The Living / 4) SP (Min 1; rounded down)
When hit, and if this unit's SP is less than 0, take (Sinking Potency / 5) Gloom damage for every value of The Departed. (Max 30; rounded down. Deals half damage to targets without SP)
Turn End: Reset The Departed to 0; gain Sinking equal to The Living and convert The Living to The Departed
No external effects can raise the amount of Butterfly inflicted. 'Inflict additional Sinking' effects inflict additional Sinking instead of inflicting additional Butterfly
This effect expires when both The Living and The Departed reach 0

Name: Reload [Lobotomy E.G.O::Solemn Lament Yi Sang]
Description:
Effect applied to The Living & The Departed
Consume (30 - The Living + The Departed on self) / 2 SP
Reset both The Living & The Departed values on self to 0, and gain the max value of their sum based on the probabilities listed in the Passive 'ISeeTheDyingButterfly'
On Reload, gain at least 1 of The Living and The Departed

Name: Strategic R&R Mode
Description:
Turn End: Recover from Stagger and retreat from Encounter (unless forced Stagger; does not count as death)
In Chain Battles, give this unit's Slots to a substituted unit and move to the rearmost place in the Backup units' Deployment Order (escape from Encounter entirely if there are no other Backup units remaining to swap places with next turn. When returning to battle, return in the order they retreated in.)
When returning to battle, return with the same amount of HP and SP when this unit retreated, and eliminate all effects on self (save for a select few)
If this unit had 0 SP when retreating, reset SP to 0 instead.

Name: Courier Trunk - Rodion
Description:
Base Value: 0
Turn Start: Gain 3 Stack
Stack does not expire upon Retreat
At 10+ Stack: Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Slash Damage Up
At 30+ Stack:
 - On Skill Use, take (Stack / 3)% HP Damage and (Stack / 3) SP Damage
 - On Turn End, take (Stack / 2)% HP Damage and (Stack / 2) SP Damage (applies before retreat)

Name: The Uninvited
Description:
Max Value: 2
Upon death, the last attacker heals 3 SP; then, a random ally without this effect gains 2 Stacks of this effect.
Take +0.5% damage for every Sinking on self (Max 10%; for Focused Encounters, each part separately)
Turn End: Reduced by 1

Name: Defensive Stance
Description:
Max Value: 2
Reduced by 1 at Turn End
When a unit gains this effect:
Fix this unit's Speed to its minimum value
Gain 5 Defense Level Up
Each of this unit's Slots gain +(10 / # of this unit's Slots) Aggro
When chaining Skills, this unit can draw enemies' attacks towards this unit regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)
Upon Clash Win, trigger Tremor Burst
Cannot be Staggered by damage

Name: Focused Attack
Description:
<Focused Encounters Only>
The unit that inflicted this Focused Attack gains the following effects based on the target Slot's Focused Attack stack.
1x Stack: Gain Clash Power +1
2x Stack: Gain Base Power +1
3x Stack: Gain Base Power +1 and Coin Power +1
Expires if, for a turn, the unit who inflicted it fails to hit the Slot inflicted with their Focused Attack
Expires if the unit who inflicted Focused Attack inflicts it on a different Slot
Replaced if a different unit inflicts Focused Attack on a Slot already inflicted with Focused Attack
At the start of the next turn, if a Slot inflicted with Focused Attack is no longer present, rearrange all Focused Attack inflicted against the Slots of that Part in Deployment Order

Name: Bloodfeast
Description:
Max Value: 999
Stores all Bleed damage dealt in this zone
Resets when moving to a different zone
This value is shared by all characters
If there is a higher Kindred among the allies who also consume Bloodfeast, this unit cannot consume Bloodfeast until that ally consumes it first.

Name: Blood-tinged Scissorblades
Description:
Max Value: 10
At 10+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades II
At 20+ Blood-tinged Scissorblades, converts to Blood-tinged Scissorblades III
Reverts to previous Stage when Stack drops below the requirements
Blood-tinged Scissorblades does not drop below 1
At Stage II, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down based on Stack
At Stage III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on Stack

Name: Sewing Target
Description:
Max Value: 1
Take +0.5% damage for every Bleed on self (Max 10%)
Turn End: reduced by 1

Name: Lasso
Description:
Max Value: 3
Turn End: Gain Rupture equal to this unit's current Speed (Max 5), and gain 1 Bind next turn
Turn End: reduced by 1

Name: Polydipsic Rose
Description:
Max Value: 5
Turn End: At 10+ Bleed Potency, take Lust damage equal to 1% of this unit's Max HP (Max 30)
Turn End: Reduced by 1

Name: Rose Wedge
Description:
Max Potency: 10
Max Count: 4
Gain 1 Potency every time this unit takes 10 Bleed damage
When gaining Bleed or Unique Bleed from getting Hit, gain 2 Bleed and inflict 1 Bleed against the Attacker (5 times per turn)
At 10 Potency, gain +1 Bleed Count as well when triggering the above effect
Turn End: Lose 1 Count
Combat End: At 10 Potency or 1 Count, this effect expires, and this unit takes (Potency x 10) Lust damage
If the unit inflicted with this effect dies, or when this effect expires: Increase Bloodfeast by (Potency x 10), and deal (Potency x 2) Lust damage against all its allies (Min 1)

Name: Ailing Heart
Description:
Max Value: 10
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack
Turn Start: Gain 1 Defense Level Up for every 3 Stack
At 50%- HP, gain 1 Defense Level Up for every 3 Stack
At 40%- HP, On Hit with Base Skills, heal (Stack x 5)% of damage dealt On Hit as HP (Min 1; rounded down; heal up to 30 HP per Skill)

Name: Bloodied Hand
Description:
Max Value: 10
At 10+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand II
At 20+ Bloodied Hand, converts to Bloodied Hand III
Reverts to previous Stage when Stack drops below the requirements
At Bloodied Hand II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack
At Bloodied Hand III, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on the Stack, and additionally inflict 1 Rupture and Bleed On Hit with Base Skills

Name: Hunger (Low Morale)
Description:
Turn Start: Gain 1 Bind and 3 Attack Power Up
Turn End: Take 5 SP Damage

Name: Hunger (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Bind and 4 Attack Power Up

Name: Guilt (Low Morale)
Description: Turn End: Gain 1 Fragile and SP Heal Efficiency Down next turn

Name: Guilt (Panic)
Description: Turn End: Gain 2 Fragile and SP Heal Efficiency Down next turn

Name: Bridle of Nihility (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Attack Power Up and 3 Defense Level Down. Take 5 SP Damage at Turn End

Name: Bridle of Nihility (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 6 Defense Level Down. Heal 10 SP at Turn End

Name: Resanguination (Low Morale)
Description: If target does not have Bleed, Clash Power -1; On Hit, heal HP equal to Bleed Potency on target

Name: Resanguination (Panic)
Description: If the target has Bleed, Clash Power +2; if target does not have Bleed, Clash Power -2; On Hit, heal HP equal to Bleed Potency on target

Name: Burden of Responsibility (Low Morale)
Description:
Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 1 Fragile; raise Max Speed by 2
Heal +30% HP when healing
Turn End: If Returning Bloodlust is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 2 Offense Level Up and Defense Level Down next turn

Name: Burden of Responsibility (Panic)
Description:
Gain 2 Attack Power Up and raise Max Speed by 2
Heal +50% HP when healing
Turn End: If Returning Bloodlust is lower than its value at Turn Start, gain 3 Offense Level Up and 5 Defense Level Down next turn

Name: Blooming Thorn
Description:
Max Value: 10
Gain 1 Defense Level Up for every 2 Stack (Max 5)
When hit, inflict 1 Bleed against attacker and lose 1 Stack

The Princess of La Manchaland Rodion Only:
At max Stack, convert into the next Stage effect
Inflict +(Stage - 1) more Bleed and Rupture with Base Attack Skills On Hit

Name: Festive Fever
Description:
Max Value: 10
Expires at Turn End
Against targets with Bleed: deal +1.5% damage with every Stack
Skills that consume or gain Bloodfeast deal +3% damage with every Stack instead

Name: Courier Trunk - Sinclair
Description:
Base Value: 0
Turn Start: Gain 3 Stack
Stack does not expire upon Retreat
At 10+ Stack: Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
At 20+ Stack: Gain 1 Clash Power Up and 1 Blunt Damage Up
At 30+ Stack:
 - On Skill Use, take (Stack / 3)% HP Damage and (Stack / 3) SP Damage
 - On Turn End, take (Stack / 2)% HP Damage and (Stack / 2) SP Damage (applies before retreat)

Name: Tremor - Clockwinding
Description:
Max Speed +1
Consume Tremor Count on self to inflict +1 Tremor or Tremor Count when inflicting them with this unit's Skill or Coin effects
When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency.
Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

Name: Hardblood
Description:
Max Stack: 10
At 10+ Hardblood, converts into Hardblood II
At 20+ Hardblood, converts into Hardblood III
Reverts to previous Stage when Stack drops below requirements
Min & Max Speed +1 for every 10 Hardblood
At Hardblood II, gain 1 Offense Level Up based on Stack
At Hardblood III, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Up based on Stack

Name: Shimmering [Bloodfiend]
Description:
Max Stack: 50
As long as this effect exists, Bleed damage taken by Shield HP is converted into Bloodfeast
Gain Shield HP equal to Stack at the moment of application
Expires at Turn End

Name: Responsibility
Description:
Clash Power +1
Deal +20% damage
Take +20% damage

Name: Dhyāna
Description:
Max Stack: 108
Deal +1% damage for every Stack

Name: Target Spotted
Description:
If Unit A applies this effect to Unit B:
Unit B follows up with an Unoppose Attck with its Skill 2 against the same enemy Unit A attacked with its Skill. Activates at Unit A's Attack End
The Skill used due to this effect does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skill list

Name: Reload [Full-Stop Office Rep Hong Lu]
Description: Lose all currently owned Ammo, and reload to full

Name: Ammo - Atelier Logic
Description:
Unique Ammo
Atelier Logic Special Ammo
This Ammo's count cannot be gained or lostdue to external effects

Name: Concentration [Sniper]
Description:
Max Stack: 4
Gain 1 Stack at Turn End

Name: Melee Support
Description:
If Unit A applies this effect to Unit B: Unit B follows up with an Unopposed Attack with 'Melee Suport' against the same enemy that attacked Unit A
Activates at Unit A's Skill End
The Skill used due to Melee Support does not affect Unit B's upcoming Skill list

Name: Overwatch Assignment
Description:
Turn End: Recover from Stagger and Retreat from the Encounter (unless it is a forced Stagger; does not count as death)
In Chain Battles, give this unit's Slots to a Subtituted unit and moved to the rearmost place in Backup unit's Deployment order (escape from Encounter entirely if there are no other Backup Units remaining to swap places with next turn. When returning to battle, return in the order they were retreated in)
When returning to battle, return with the same amount of HP and SP as this unit had when it retreated, and eliminate all effects on self, save for a select few
If this unit had less than 0 SP on Retreat, reset SP to 0 instead

Name: Reload [Full-Stop Office Fixer Heathcliff]
Description: Lose all currently owned Ammo, and reload to full

Name: The Magic Bullet
Description:
See:
The First Magic Bullet
The Second Magic Bullet
The Third Magic Bullet
The Fourth Magic Bullet
The Fifth Magic Bullet
The Sixth Magic Bullet
The Seventh Magic Bullet

Name: The First Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +20% damage
Raise target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (Max 30)

Name: The Second Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +10% damage
Deal damage to targets other than main target (Max 4); main target takes 0 damage
On Hit, inflict 3 Paralyze

Name: The Third Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +20% damage
Before Attack: Gain +2 Attack Weight
On Hit, inflict 2 Attack Power Down and 10 Burn

Name: The Fourth Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +30% damage
Before Attack: Gain +3 Attack Weight
On Hit, raise target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (Max 20); inflict 3 Fragile next turn

Name: The Fifth Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +30% damage
Before Attack: Gain +4 Attack Weight
On Hit, inflict 10 Burn; inflict 4 Offense Level Down and 4 Defense Level Down next turn

Name: The Sixth Magic Bullet
Description:
Before Attack: Gain +6 Attack Weight
On Hit, raise target's Stagger Threshold by damage dealt (Max 30)
Reuse Coin for every 7 Burn on main target (Max 2 times)
Plus Coin Skill Base Power -16
Plus Coin Power -8
 Minus Coin Skill Base Power -22
Minus Coin Power -12

Name: The Seventh Magic Bullet
Description:
Deal +200% damage
Deal +2.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on target (Max 200%)
Before Attack: For this attack, if Pierce Res on self or target are less than x2.0, change Pierce Damage Res on both target and self to x2.0
After Attack: This unit dies

Name: Requested Target
Description:
+0.2 Resistance to Attack Types with 1.5 or less Resistance.
If the target with this effect is defeated, gain 1 E.G.O Resource for all Affinities, and the unit that defeated the targt heals 10 SP

Name: Fairy Lure
Description:
Max Stack: 5
Turn Start: Leftmost Slot on the Dashboard gains +10 Aggro
Take +50% damage
When hit, inflict 1 Rupture against the attacker (3 times per target's Skill)
At less than 50% HP, inflict +1 Rupture
If target has 15+ Rupture, this buff does not inflict Rupture
Reduced by 1at Turn End

Name: Deep Breath
Description:
Max Stack: 20
On Crit: At 15+ Poise and 5+ Poise Count, consume (Poise / 5) Poise to deal +(Poise Consumed x 4)% more damage on Critical Hit; then lose 1 Stack

Name: Nebulizer ß
Description:
Max Stack: 5
This effect lasts for the duration of the Encounter
When activating Pride A-Res, (Stack) allies gain 3 Poise and +3 Poise Count at Combat Start (Prioritizes allies that gain or use Poise or Poise Count; among them, prioritizes allies with the least Poise)

Name: Dark Cloud Blade
Description:
Max Stack: 1
Gain 1 Slash Power Up
Inflict 1 Bleed On Hit with Slash Skills

Name: Battle Ready
Description:
Max Stack: 1
+1 Bleed and Bleed Count inflicted with this unit's Skill or Coin Effects
Gain 1 Slash Power Up and 3 Slash DMG Up for the duration of this Encounter

Name: Dark Cloud
Description:
Max Stack: 1
Turn every Coin on this unit's Base Attack Skills into Unbreakable Coins; this unit cannot be Staggered due to damage until said Skill ends; inflict more +1 Bleed effects with its Coins
On Clash Lose, Final Power +3
Turn End: This effect expires

Name: Cumulus Wall
Description:
Max Stack: 1
Defense Skill Final Power +1
This effect expires at Turn End or after 'Rules of the Backstreets' ends

Name: Reawakening Joy of Carnage (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Offense Level Up and +2 SP Heal Efficiency

Name: Reawakening Joy of Carnage (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 6 Defense Level Up; gain 3 Offense Level Up next turn

Name: The Church (Low Morale)
Description:
Gain 1 additional Smoke or Smoke Count when gaining them.
Turn Start: Gain 3 Fragile, 2 Damage Up, and 1 Defense Power Up

Name: The Church (Panic)
Description:
Gain 2 additional Smoke or Smoke Count when gaining them.
Turn Start: Gain 3 Fragile, 4 Damage Up and 2 Defense Power Up

Name: Anguish (Low Morale)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Fragile and 2 SP Heal Efficiency Down

Name: Anguish (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Fragile and 3 SP Heal Efficiency Down

Name: Shallow Exhale
Description:
Max Stack: 1
At 20+ Poise, gain +1 Poise Count with this unit's Skill or Coin effects
Expires at Turn End

Name: Nebulizer α
Description:
Max Stack: 5
This effect persists through the Encounter
Combat Start: Apply 1 Poise and +1 Poise Count to all allies including this unit

Name: District 12 Fuel
Description:
Max Stack: 100
Consumed by certain Skills
At 50- Stack, becomes Overheated Fuel

Name: Overheated Fuel
Description:
Max Stack: 100
Consuming District 12 Fuel in Overheated Fuel state consumes Overheated Fuel instead
Consuming Overheated Fuel also counts as consuming District 12 Fuel
At 51+ Stack, becomes District 12 Fuel

Name: Nerve Strike
Description:
Max Stack: 3
The unit that inflicted this Nerve Strike gains the following effects based on target's/Part's Nerve Strike Stack
1x Stack: Clash Power +1
2x Stack: Base Power +1
3x Stack: Clash Power +1 and Base Power +1
Expires if the unit that inflicted it inflicts this effect against a different target/Part
Replaced when another unit inflicts Nerve Strike

Name: Strider [Mao]
Description:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: Gain 5 Haste next turn
Reduced by 1 at Turn End

Name: Deathrite [Haste]
Description:
Base Stack: 3
When getting Rupture triggered by getting hit by an Attack Skill from a target with 10+ Speed, lose 1 Stack and gain +1 Rupture Count
At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture on self; then this effect expires
Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while already active

Name: Book of Vengeance
Description:
Max Stack: 30
Deal +(Stack)% damage (Max 30%)
Gain the following effects next turn based on Stack:
At 10+ Stack: Gain 1 Blunt DMG Up
At 20+ Stack: Gain Max Speed +1 and 1 Power Up
At 30 Stack: Gain 2 Blunt DMG Up

Name: Vendetta Mark
Description:
Max Stack: 10
Consumed by certain Skills or Passives
Take +2% damage from The Middle enemies for every Stack (Max 20%)
Turn End: The unit with the highest Stack of this effect gains 1 Sibling Vengeance Mark next turn
(Counted separately from Vengeance mark; if more than a single unit has the highest Stack of this effect, this effect targets the one with a higher HP percentage)

Name: Sibling Vengeance Mark
Description:
Max Stack: 1
Expires at Turn End
Every Identity treats this unit as having their Vengeance Mark

Name: Searing Birdcage
Description:
Max Stack: 5
If this unit has Burn, weaken Wrath Resist by 0.1 for every Stack (Does not weaken past 2.0)
Turn End: Gain Bind equal to Stack next turn
Turn End: Halve stack
Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

Name: Unfocused Volley
Description:
When this Skill flips Coins, each Coin flips against a random enemy among its targets
The first Coin always targets the main target
All 'On Hit' effects and all damage dealt by each Coins are inflicted only against the random target the Coin selected

Name: Serpent Arm
Description:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: Gain 3 Poise and +2 Poise Count next turn
On Base Attack Skill use, if target has Rupture, gain 5 Poise
Turn End: Lose 1 Stack

Name: Deathrite [Venom]
Description:
Base Stack: 5
-Deathrite
-When getting Rupture triggered by a Critical Hit from the target, lose 1 Stack
-When losing Stacks due to this effect, gain 1 Offense Level Down or 1 Defense Level Down (3 times per turn)
-When losing Stacks due to this effect, if the Stack drops to 0, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture on self
-Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while active

Name: Tianjiu Star's Blade
Description:
Max Stack: 20
At 10+ Stack, gain 1 Haste next turn at Turn End
Used for certain Skills

Name: Deathrite [Fissure]
Description:
Base Stack: 3
When getting Rupture triggered while this unit has Deathrite, lose 1 Stack, and gain 1 Bind next turn
When this effect activates, if this unit is to gain 3 or more Bind next turn, lose 2 Stacks instead of gaining Bind
At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture on self
-Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

Name: Assist Defense
Description:
Max Stack: 3
When an ally is about to take an Unopposed Attack from an enemy, consume 1 Stack to redirect the enemy's targeting to self; then, use the Skill that activates for Assist Defense
When multiple allies have Assist Defense Stacks, the ally with the highest Stack has the highest activation priority
Does not activate for allies who equipped Defense Skills
Expires at Turn End

Name: Mark of Decay
Description:
Max Stack: 1
Take +10% damage from Gluttony Affinity Skills
Take +10% damage from Deathrite effects
Expires at Turn End

Name: Twisted Curse Talisman
Description:
Max Stack: 10
Expires at Turn End
At 10+ Stack, when taking 30+ damage from a Skill: Gain +1 Rupture Count; take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture on self (Once per turn)
When this effect expires, gain (Stack / 4) Attack Power Down next turn (Max 2)
-Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active

Name: Centipede Venom
Description:
Max Stack: 20
Turn End: Gain (Stack / 4) Defense Level Down next turn (Rounded down)
Turn End: Take Gluttony damage equal to Stack, and halve the Stack (Rounded down)
Upon death, transfers to this unit's ally (For Focused Encounters, a different Part) with none or the least Centipede Venom Stacks.

Name: Deception (Low Morale)
Description: If this unit's Speed is faster than target's or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +10% damage against the target

Name: Deception (Panic)
Description: If this unit's Speed is faster than target's or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +20% damage against the target; if this unit's Speed is faster than target's, take -20% damage

Name: Night in the Backstreets (Panic)

Name: Flower-burying Wedge [埋花櫼]
Description:
Base Stack: 0
Max Stack: 3
All Coins on this unit's leftmost Base Attack Skill on the Dashboard become Unbreakable Coins
Turn Start: Gain 2 Offense Level Up and 2 Defense Level Down
At 3+ Stack, gain 1 Tarnished Blood (Once per Encounter)
Turn End: Gain 1 Stack
-Cannot raise the effect's Stack by any other means than the ones above
Expires on death or Retreat

When this unit takes damage that brings their HP to 0: HP does not drop below 1, do not become Staggered or Defeated, and use 'Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End' at Turn End. Remove Flower-burying Wedge when the Skill ends.
If this unit takes fatal damage at Turn End, use 'Tears of the Tarnished Blood - The End' next turn based on this unit's Speed.

Name: Tarnished Blood
Description:
Max Stack: 5
Turn End: Take 20% HP damage per Stack (does not Stagger)
Gain 1 at Turn End

Name: Flower-Burying Pin [埋花針]

-Gain 1 Stack at Turn End or when hit
-Gain 1 Offense Level per 5 Stack
If the unit with this effect dies, inflict Gluttony damage equal to Stack and inflict 5 Rupture

Name: Denial [不許]
Description:
When this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0: This unit's HP does not drop below 1; recover from Stagger due to damage
If ths above effect activated, dies at Turn End
Expires on death, Retreat, or Turn End

Name: Ready [待]
Description:
Max Stack: 3
Number of turns this unit spent in Retreat or as a Backup Unit

Name: Launcher [始]
Description:
Max Stack: 6
Number of turns this unit spent active in an Encounter
Expires on Retreat
Gain Stack at Turn End

Name: Assist [援]
Description:
Max Stack: 1
If target has 5+ negative effects, Clash Power +1 and deal +10% damage

Name: Battlefield Retreat
Description:
Turn End: Recover from Stagger and Retreat from the Encounter (unless it is a forced Stagger; does not count as death)
In Chain Battles, give this unit's Slots to a Subtituted unit and moved to the rearmost place in Backup unit's Deployment order (escape from Encounter entirely if there are no other Backup Units remaining to swap places with next turn. When returning to battle, return in the order they were retreated in)
When returning to battle, return with the same amount of HP and SP as this unit had when it retreated, and eliminate all effects on self, save for a select few
If this unit had less than 0 SP on Retreat, reset SP to 0 instead

Name: Thorns (Low Morale)
Description: Clash Win: Gain 1 Damage Up

Name: Thorns (Panic)
Description:
Clash Win: Gain 1 Damage Up
Turn End: Gain 2 Clash Power Up next turn

Name: Le Regole (Low Morale)
Description:
If this unit inflicted 2+ Tremor last turn, gain 1 Sloth DMG Up
If this unit inflicted 2+ Burn last turn, gain 1 Wrath DMG Up
If this unit failed to inflict anything, gain 2 Defense level Down

Name: Le Regole (Panic)
Description:
If this unit inflicted 2+ Tremor last turn, gain 2 Sloth DMG Up
If this unit inflicted 2+ Burn last turn, gain 2 Wrath DMG Up
If this unit failed to inflict anything, gain 3 Defense level Down

Name: Beastly Instinct (Low Morale)
Description:
Deals +(HP percentage difference / 2)% damage to targets with higher HP percentages than this unit's (Max 10%)
Turn Start: Gain 1 Attack Power Up, 1 Damage Up, and 1 Fragile

Name: Beastly Instinct (Panic)
Description:
Deals +(HP percentage difference)% damage to targets with higher HP percentages than this unit's (Max 25%)
Turn Start: Gain 1 Plus Coin Boost, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Fragile

Description: Turn Start: Gain 5 Bleed and 1 Attack Power Up

Name: Flesh Scoop (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 10 Bleed and 2 Attack Power Up

Name: Heart Toward the New Era (Panic)

Name: Soft Goldcasted Heart (Panic)
Description: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 2 Fragile

Name: Inherited Will of Hongyuan (Low Morale)
Description:
All Parts gain 2 Attack Power Up and 1 Bind
When the Body Part loses a Clash against Hong Lu: The Body Part gains 1 Damage Up and 1 Fragile next turn (Once per turn)

Name: Inherited Will of Hongyuan (Panic)
Description:
All Parts gain 2 Attack Power Up and 2 Bind
When the Body Part loses a Clash against Hong Lu: The Body Part gains 2 Damage Up and 2 Fragile next turn (Once per turn)

Name: Infinitely Bequeathing Will of Hongyuan (Low Morale)
Description:

Units generated by this unit gain 3 Defense Level Down
